channel.title: R on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in R on A Hugo website

item.title: DiagrammeR
item.description: R语言绘制流程图 R语言为用户提供了大量的绘图函数，包括基于图形语法的ggplot2和传统绘图包等。 R语言中基于低水平绘图设备（仅能绘制基本图形） library(grid) grid.roundrect(width=0.25, height=0.25) grid.text("四川大学") pushViewport(viewport(width=0.25,height=0.125)) grid.roundrect() grid.text("四川大学", x=unit(3,"mm"), y=unit(2,"lines"), just="left") grid.text("公共管理学院", x=unit(2,"mm"), y=unit(0.5,"lines"), just="left") popViewport() 通过R建立流程图 library(DiagrammeR) ## Registered S3 methods overwritten by 'ggplot2': ## method from ## [.quosures rlang ## c.quosures rlang ## print.quosures rlang grViz("digraph flowchart { # node definitions with substituted label text node [fontname = Helvetica, shape = rectangle] tab1 [label = '@@1'] tab2 [label = '@@2'] tab3 [label = '@@3'] tab4 [label = '@@4'] tab5 [label = '@@5'] # edge definitions with the node IDs tab1 -> tab2 -> tab3 -> tab4 -> tab5; } [1]: '七点半起床' [2]: '八点出门吃早餐' [3]: '八点二十到图书馆开始学习' [4]: '十二点离开图书馆吃饭并午休半小时' [5]: '下午继续学习' ") {"

item.title: web crawler
Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
